body_text:
How can Haku perform hand seals with only one hand? In the Land of the Waves arc, it can be seen that Haku performs handseals with only one hand. That must be something special, because a.) even Kakashi was surprised to see that, and b.) that's never seen again somewhere (except I forgot it).
How is that possible? Is that a special technique? Was it ever explained in the manga/anime?
Can a ninjutsu be executed without the use of hand seals? Is it possible to execute any ninjutsu without using handseals?
